abstract: Illinois Atty Gen Lisa Madigan formally declares daily fantasy sports illegal under state's gambling regulations; notifies FanDuel and DraftKings of her opinion and warns them to stop accepting bets from state residents; notes pending legislation could make games legal in future.
lead_paragraph: The Illinois attorney general said it did not matter if daily fantasy sports involved skill or luck because state law prohibited them either way.

headline.main: Illinois Says Daily Fantasy Sports Are Illegal
headline.print_headline: Illinois Says Daily Fantasy Is Illegal

snippet: The Illinois attorney general said it did not matter if daily fantasy sports involved skill or luck because state law prohibited them either way.
